page.title: 02POPULATION-FISHBOURNE
page.content: In Fishbourne the population seems to be mostly old people. A lot of people have{retired}to Fishbourne which has made the houses very{expensive.}This means that young families cannot afford to live here, so the{school numbers are falling.}I don't think many children that live in Fishbourne like having so many old people around because if you play in the road where its safe you still get old people coming out to{complain.}As children are leaving the area the remaing children have less friends to play with,and after school most children don't live near enough each other to play.
